MAC0242-Project

Packages 
Package Description
arena
Defines the runtime of the system, allowing the robots battle over the 4 weathers.
exception
Defines a set of exception for being used within all the project.
main  
parameters
Defines general behaviors for the game and provides a debugger for the program.
parser
Defines a series of compilers to be parsed to RVM's bytecode
players
Defines a set of classes that are user-specific.
random
Defines a set of themes for the maps in the arena.
remote
Works as a protocol of communication between a Player/RVM and the arena's World main controller class.
robot
Defines a set of classes for manipulating the "Robot Virtual Machine" (RVM).
scenario
Defines general elements to be put in a map for making it more iteractive.
stackable
Defines valid types inside the main stack of a robot virtual machine (RVM)
stackable.item
Defines valid types both inside the main stack of a robot virtual machine (RVM) - as a stackable - and also inside a robot cargo - as a catchable item in the map.
ui
Defines an interface for the visual exhibition of the game (GUI).
ui.graphical
Defines a Graphical User Interface for the game (using AWT and Swing).
ui.textual
Defines a Textual User Interface for the game (using Ansi Escape Colors for terminals).
